data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Tolna, Hungary to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tolna, Hungary
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Tolna, Hungary to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Tolna an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Tolna, Hungary, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Arab, general people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Tolna.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Tolna, Hungary with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Tolna, Hungary to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

location.name: Tolna
location.people_groups_list: Jew, Hungarian-speaking, Chinese, general, Vietnamese, Bosniak, Turk
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jew, Hungarian-speaking (47,000), Chinese, general (6,400), Vietnamese (3,300), Bosniak (19,000), Turk (2,500)
